creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: brocading and pierced woven strips; multicolored and multistriped; extra pieces added on; one strip cut at end to imitate fringe; strips of various warps sewn together; colors ranging in red/pink/blues to yellow/tan/black
title: Head Wrapper
